title: Serious Team looking for Mid laner. Gold+
body:
Couple things if you want to join.

* Have a working mic.
* Be able to commit to 3 nights a week.
* Non-toxic and happy to be in a team environment.
* Have the overall goal of improving, and no, not just in solo q, in the ranked 5s scene as--well, this includes communication, trust, gaining synergy with your team mates and so-on. 
* Be willing to take constructive criticism, and give it too.
* Be serious about your lane, if you say you main mid, then actually main it, play it as much as you can in solo q, in norms, in any mode, make sure you are improving on your role. Sure you can have fun in other lanes. But Genuinely put effort into being the best you can be in mid, there is 4 other players on your team during a game, no point letting them down if you are not serious about improving.

Just add me in-game to have a chat about it. IGN: Matchbox420

replies.body:
Hi, if the position is still open, here are my infos :

My info :
Ingame Name : Katalize

Current Rank: G3
Highest Rank Achieved: G1

Top 5 Mid Champs:
Currently playing a lot : Brand / Veigar / Kayle / Cassio / Velkoz
Highly skilled on : Elise / Fizz / TF / katarina / LB / Zed

What do you want from a team:
I value team spirit, working on our mutual flaws together.
I expect my team members to be open to criticism as much as I am.
I am not a leader type, yet I expect to be able to give advice and strategic opinions, while being heard out.
I am looking to learn from other experienced and motivated players.

Rank 5s Experience:
I have played in a 5 teams in season 3, Australian player base on NA server. I was the mid laner and our compositions relied on CC / AOE such as Galio / Cho gath / Kennen / Vlad mid picks.
I haven't played in 5's ranked since then, mainly in 3s on Twisted treeline and solo/ duo queue on SR.

Cheers,
Will add when i finish work
